title: Hitler - A Torn Nation Series
description:
The Hitler - A Torn Nation Trilogy Series Collection
===========================================================================

Hitler - A Torn Nation
----------------------

We take a look at the start of Hitler&#039;s childhood and see how his life
unfold to an unknown soldier, into the Leader he became.

We also take a look at WWII how and why it started. We take a look at the
Historic Records of WWI and see Germany had been sold out when they were
winning the war which lead to Germany&#039;s defeat causing a heavy wave of
depression throughout the nation forcing the German People to struggle
for survival.


Hitler - A Torn Nation II
-------------------------

This is the second to the Series, we take a look at who declared WWII, and
why Germany invaded Poland.

We take a look at the Massacres which occurred within the Danzig Corridor,
which was former West Prussia of Germany which was one of the many German
Territories annexed ater WWI, which we learn was one of the many reasons
why Hitler had been voted in by the People. We also take a quick glimpse
at who was involved in the 1917 "Russian" Revolution leading to the murder
of the Romanovs.


Hitler - A Torn Nation III
--------------------------

In the last o the Series, we look at WWII and Germany&#039;s defeat. We take a
look at the Fire Bombing of cities like Dresden, a major city holding a
large amount of Eastern European Refugees fleeing the Soviet Union. Which
killed more people, in one single day alone, then ever recorded in history.
We also look at some of the Horrors that befell upon the People of Germany
during and after the War. We take a glimpse at the statistics of rape that
occured with victims of all ages, starting from small children, to the
elderly women.

===========================================================================

Hitler - The Accused
--------------------

A continuation of Hitler - A Torn Nation Trilogy Series.
This is the fourth video to the Series.

This video is on the struggle brought about on the German People, the
Russian People and the suffering of the surrounding Nations during WWII
and after the War. This video has footage on some of the bombings and
mass-extermination of different Eastern European Nations brought about by
Stalin.

*The Photos and footage in this video are real and the viewer may find it
disturbing.

===========================================================================

Valhalla Videos - Where Our People Matter
-----------------------------------------

A Valhalla Videos Ad

Videos; History, Documentaries, Entertainment and etc.

You can post this video yourself, spread it around. Keep the flame burning!
